document_data.name: Plenerond Silverbell
document_data.mainbody: '''Plenerond Silverbell''' was a knight of the [[Knights in Silver]] during the late 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], during an assault by [[orc]] and [[drow]] on the [[Silver Marches]], Plenerond and [[Doughty]] were part of a contingent of Knights under [[Aleina Brightlance]] and helped in the defense of [[Sundabar]].
